level.heading: Materials and methods of construction.
level.text: ยง 27-586 Materials and methods of construction. Materials and methods of construction used in the manufacture and/or placement of structural elements in a building shall be subject to the requirements of article seven of subchapter one of this chapter, the inspection provisions established in tables 10-1 and 10-2 and the detailed requirements of articles four through twelve of this subchapter and article thirteen of subchapter eleven of this chapter.
